commits.body:
## Description
Main application chart (the `mermin` chart) should not have any
dependencies that are not essential for the application to run.
To represent the "Mermin with NetObserv and OpenSearch" another chart
(an
[umbrella](https://helm.sh/docs/howto/charts_tips_and_tricks/#complex-charts-with-many-dependencies)
chart) is introduced with zero templates, only dependencies.
Umbrella chart is currently absent in order to properly build
dependencies

Changes summary
* fix(ci): Release PRs should be done against "current" branch
* chore(helm): "local" example does not need OTLP unless OTLP receiver
is present
* feat(ci): Separate release flow for Mermin and "composite" chart
* feat: Split "mermin" and "mermin-netobserv-os" to separate charts
Keep `mermin` chart without any dependencies, introduce
`mermin-netobserv-os` chart

Note, release may fail due to experimental state of the underlying
release tool.
